category_id.description: The id of the category to which this section belongs.

parent_section_id.description: The id of the section to which this section belongs. Only writable for Guide Enterprise customers.

position.description: The position of this section in the section list.

locale.description: The locale where the section is displayed.

url.description: The API url of this section.

html_url.description: The url of this section in Help Center.

source_locale.description: The source (default) locale of the section.

theme_template.description: The theme template name used to display this section in Help Center.

outdated.description: Whether the section is out of date.

created_at.description: The time at which the section was created.

updated_at.description: The time at which the section was last updated.
